chan_desc: Cellular actin cytoskeleton assayed using 500 μL Alexa488-conjugated phalloidin (Life Technologies # A12379)
Cellular mitochondria assayed using 200 μl of 10 X MitoTracker solution
Nuclear DNA assayed using 75 μL 0.5 mg/mL DAPI (Fisher 50-310-420)
Nuclear DNA synthesis assayed using 200 μL of 0.1 mM EdU (5-ethynyl-2'-deoxyuridine; Life Technologies #C10357)
Nuclear ribonucleoproteins assayed using 187.5 μL fibrillarin antibody
Constitutive nuclear heterochromatin assayed using 187.5 μL histone H3K9Me3 antibody (Abcam #ab8898)
Cytoplasmic keratin 19 assayed using 250 μL KRT19 antibody (Millipore #MAB3238); Cytoplasmic keratin 5 assayed using 187.5 μL KRT5 antibody (BioLegend #905501)
